people.name: Arvell Shaw
people.description: Arvell Shaw  was an American jazz double-bassist, best known for his work with Louis Armstrong.

people.name: Julio Cortázar
people.description: Julio Cortázar, born Jules Florencio Cortázar , was an Argentine novelist, short story writer, and essayist.

people.name: Danny Kaye
people.description: David Daniel Kaminsky , better known by his screen name Danny Kaye, was an American actor, singer, dancer, comedian, and musician.

people.name: Pepper Adams
people.description: Park Frederick "Pepper" Adams III  was an American jazz baritone saxophonist and composer.

people.name: Art Pepper
people.description: Arthur Edward Pepper, Jr.   was an American alto saxophonist and clarinetist.

people.name: Happy Caldwell
people.description: Albert W.  "Happy" Caldwell   was an American jazz clarinetist and tenor saxophonist.

people.name: Bruce Hart
people.description: Bruce Hart  was an American songwriter and screenwriter perhaps best known for composing the lyrics to the theme song to Sesame Street.

people.name: Zoot Sims
people.description: John Haley "Zoot" Sims  was an American jazz saxophonist, playing mainly tenor and soprano.
